testsuite.name: LearningProgressTrackerTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Presentation error in test #29
The output is empty, but should contain lines (expected to be equal to 1, found 0)
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Learning Progress Tracker > > find Enter an id or 'back' to return: > back Enter 'exit' to exit the program. > back
